about.title: Who we are?
about.description: We are a software development company committed to excellence. We design and implement high-impact digital solutions, combining innovation, quality and technological experience.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: We drive business and entrepreneur growth through technology, transforming ideas into concrete digital results.

experience.title: Experience that transforms
experience.description: Our clients value our closeness and the proactive way we work. We are characterized by a fresh and bold vision, always focused on delivering solutions that really make a difference.

value3.title: Constant innovation

value4.title: Guaranteed quality

automationService.title: Automate your business
automationService.description: We implement solutions that automate repetitive processes, reduce errors, and free up valuable time so you can focus on growing your business.

benefits.title: Why automate your business?
benefits.description: Automation is not just technology, it’s the key to sustainable and efficient growth

item1.title: Save valuable time
item1.description: Eliminate repetitive tasks and free your team for strategic activities

item2.title: Reduce human errors
item2.description: Automated processes are consistent and accurate 24/7

item3.title: Increase productivity
item3.description: Your company can process more with the same resources

item4.title: Automatic scalability
item4.description: Systems grow with your business without needing extra staff

areas.title: Areas we can automate
areas.description: From sales to HR, we automate the processes that consume the most time

automationAreas.title: Customer Management (CRM)
automationAreas.description: Automate follow-ups from first contact to sale

automationAreas.title: Billing and Collections
automationAreas.description: Generate invoices and manage payments without manual intervention

automationAreas.title: Inventory and Procurement
automationAreas.description: Maintain optimal stock with automatic replenishment

automationAreas.title: Digital Marketing
automationAreas.description: Campaigns run automatically and optimize themselves

automationAreas.title: Customer Support
automationAreas.description: Respond to inquiries and solve problems 24/7

process.title: How we implement automation
process.description: Gradual process without interruptions for your daily operation

processAreas.title: Process Mapping
processAreas.description: We identify which tasks can be automated and prioritize by impact

processAreas.title: Workflow Design
processAreas.description: We create optimized automated flows tailored to your business

processAreas.title: Gradual Implementation
processAreas.description: We install automation in phases to minimize disruptions

processAreas.title: Training
processAreas.description: We train your team to manage and leverage automations effectively

processAreas.title: Monitoring and Optimization
processAreas.description: We continuously monitor performance and improve over time

items.question: How long does it take to develop a website?
items.answer: A basic site takes 2–3 weeks, a professional one 4–6 weeks, and an e-commerce site 6–8 weeks.

items.question: Does it include hosting and domain?
items.answer: We help you set up hosting and domain, but annual costs are separate (approximately $100–150/year).

items.question: Can I update the content myself?
items.answer: Yes, we include an easy-to-use admin panel and train you to manage your site independently.

items.question: What if I need changes later?
items.answer: We include support during the specified period. After that, we offer maintenance plans or one-time updates.

cta_section.title: Ready to create your website?
cta_section.description: Let's talk about your project and discover how we can help you build a successful digital presence.
